tags: i really only read it for the corrections
quote-source: The Economist, Democracy in America: I give you Narendra Modi, September 29, 2014.
quote-text: Editor’s note: The second sentence of this blog post was changed on September 29th to make clear that The Economist does not consider Mr Modi to be a “pain in the ass”; that epithet is merely how we imagined an uninformed New Yorker might feel about someone who causes a traffic jam.
